Package org.apache.lucene.codecs.sep

Sep: base support for separate files (doc,frq,pos,skp,pyl)

See:
          Description

Class Summary
IntIndexInput Defines basic API for writing ints to an IndexOutput.
IntIndexInput.Index Records a single skip-point in the IntIndexInput.Reader.
IntIndexInput.Reader Reads int values.
IntIndexOutput Defines basic API for writing ints to an IndexOutput.
IntIndexOutput.Index Records a single skip-point in the IndexOutput.
IntStreamFactory Provides int reader and writer to specified files.
SepPostingsReader Concrete class that reads the current doc/freq/skip postings format.
SepPostingsWriter Writes frq to .frq, docs to .doc, pos to .pos, payloads to .pyl, skip data to .skp
 

Package org.apache.lucene.codecs.sep Description

Sep: base support for separate files (doc,frq,pos,skp,pyl)
